#summary Which features have been implemented.
#labels Phase-Implementation

====Note: The set of matched elements are all the elements found by the given selector. These features are used the following way: `$(selector).feature(arg)`====

|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| get() || Yes || Returns all matched elements in array format ||
|| get(index) || Yes || Returns the element at "index" of the set of matched elements ||
|| size() || Yes || Returns the number of matched elements ||
|| each(callback) || Yes || Apply the iterator function "callback" to each of the matched elements ||

----
== Selectors ==

=== Basic ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| #id || Yes || Selects the element corresponding to the id ||
|| element || Yes || Selects all elements with the given tag ||
|| .class || Yes || Selects all elements with the given class ||

=== Hierarchy ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| ancestor descendant || Yes || Selects all descendants of the element ||
|| parent > child || Yes || Selects all immediate children of the element ||

=== Filters ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| :first || Yes || Selects the first element ||
|| :last || Yes || Selects the last element ||


----
== Attributes ==

=== Attr ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| attr(name) || Yes || Return the given attribute of the first matched element ||
|| attr(key,value) || Yes || Set a single property to a value on all the matched elements ||
|| removeAttr(name) || Yes || Remove an attribute from each of the matched elements ||

=== Class ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| addClass(classNames) || Yes || classNames is a string specifying the class(es) separated by spaces to be added as an attribute to the matched elements ||
|| hasClass(className) || Yes || Returns true if the specified class is present in at least one of the matched elements, and false otherwise ||
|| removeClass(classNames) || Yes || Removes the specified classes from the matched elements ||
|| removeClass() || Yes || Removes all classes from the set of matched elements ||
|| toggleClass(class) || Yes || For each matched element, add the specified class if not present; remove class if it is ||


----
== Traversing ==

=== Filtering ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| eq(n) || Yes || Reduce the set of matched elements to be the nth matched element ||
|| slice(start, end) || Yes || Selects a subset of the matched elements, specified by the start and end indices of the set of matched elements ||
|| not(selector) || Yes || Remove elements matching the selector from the list of matched elements ||
|| filter(selector) || Yes || Keeps only elements from the set of matched elements that match the given selector ||
|| filter(fn) || Yes || Only keeps elements for which the given function returns true ||
|| is(selector) || Yes || Checks if at least one of the matched elements matches the given selector. returns true or false ||

=== Finding ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| find(expr) || Yes || Searches for descedents of the matched elements that match the specified expr ||
|| add(selector) || Yes || Add more elements, matched by the given selector, to the set of matched elements ||
|| children() || Yes || Get the set of elements containing all of the unique immediate children of the set of matched elements ||
|| parent() || Yes || Get the set of the direct parent elements of each of the matched elements ||
|| next() || Yes || Get the set of unique next siblings of each of the matched elements ||
|| prev() || Yes || Get the set of unique previous siblings of each of the matched elements ||
|| siblings() || Yes || Get the set of unique siblings of each of the matched elements ||

----
== Manipulation ==

=== Changing Contents ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| html() || Yes || Returns the innerHTML of the first matched element ||
|| html(val) || Yes || Set the innerHTML contents of every matched element ||

=== Inserting Inside ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| append(html) || Yes || Appends the given HTML to innerHTML of matched elements ||
|| append(ele) || Yes || Appends the given DOM element to innerHTML of matched elements ||
|| append(wootQueryObj)|| Yes || Appends content of the given wootQuery object to innerHTML of matched elements ||
|| prepend(html) || Yes || Prepends the given HTML to innerHTML of matched elements ||
|| prepend(ele) || Yes || Prepends the given DOM element to innerHTML of matched elements ||
|| prepend(wootQueryObj)|| Yes || Prepends content of the given wootQuery object to innerHTML of matched elements ||

=== Inserting Outside ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| after(content) || Yes || Insert content after each of the matched elements ||
|| before(content) || Yes || Insert content after each of the matched elements ||

=== Inserting Around ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| wrap(html) || Yes || Wrap each matched element with the specified HTML string ||
|| wrap(ele) || Yes || Wrap each matched element with the specified DOM element ||
|| wrapInner(html) || Yes || Wrap the inner contents of each matched element with an HTML string ||
|| wrapInner(ele) || Yes || Wrap the inner contents of each matched element with a DOM element ||

=== Replacing ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| replaceWith(html) || Yes || Replaces all matched elements with specified HTML||
|| replaceWith(ele) || Yes || Replaces all matched elements with specified DOM elements ||

=== Removing ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| empty || Yes || Remove child nodes of each of the matched elements ||
|| remove() || Yes || Removes all matched elements from the DOM ||

=== Clone ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| clone() || Yes || Clone the matched elements and select them ||


----
== CSS ==

=== CSS ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| css(name) || Yes || Returns the value of the css property specified ||
|| css(properties) || Yes || Sets CSS properties based on a key/value object ||
|| css(name,value) || Yes || Sets a specfic CSS property to a given value ||


----
== Events ==

=== Page Load ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| ready(fn) || Yes || Delays execution of argument code until DOM is ready ||

=== Interaction Helpers ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| hover(over,out) || Almost`*` || A shorthand for mouseover and mouseout ||

=== Event Helpers ===
|| Command || Implemented? || Description ||
|| click() || Yes || Simulates clicking the selected elements ||
|| click(fn) || Yes || Assigns a click event to selected elements ||
|| dblclick() || No`*` || Simulates a double-click on the selected elements ||
|| dblclick(fn) || Yes || Assigns a double-click event to selected elements ||
|| mouseover(fn) || Almost`*` || Assigns a mousover event to selected elements ||
|| mouseout(fn) || Almost`*` || Assigns a mouseout event to selected elements ||


`*` See notes in JS file
